sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SORRENTO, a ſea-port town of the kingdom of Naples, with an archbiſhop’s ſee. It is ſeated in a peninſula, on the bay of Naples, at the foot of a mountain of the ſame name, 17 miles ſouth-eaſt of Naples. It is the birth-place of Torquato Taffo. E. Long. 14. 24. N. Lat. 40. 36.
